Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes.splash

Class SplashScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes.StaticScene
      • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes.DynamicScene
        • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.scenes.splash.SplashScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clearable, Configurable, Destroyable, nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.events.userinput.KeyListener, Initializable, RequiresInjection, DimensionsProvider, WithSupplier, YaegerScene, Updatable, UpdateDelegator, WithTimerList, WithTimers
    public class SplashScene
extends DynamicScene
implements WithTimers
    A Splash Screen, being an instance of YaegerScene that will be shown a given number of miliseconds at the start of a YaegerApplication.
